SELECT min( IFNULL(bi.inventory,f.room_stock) ) inventory FROM (SELECT x.date, c.room_code, c.room_stock FROM biz_room c JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( date, '%Y%m%d' ) date FROM calendar WHERE date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( #{inDateStart}, '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT( #{outDateEnd}, '%Y%m%d') ) x ) f LEFT JOIN biz_inv bi ON f.room_code = bi.room_code AND f.date = bi.inv_date LEFT JOIN biz_prise g ON f.room_code = g.room_code and f.date = g.price_date WHERE g.s_price is not null AND f.room_code = #{roomCode} GROUP BY f.room_code HAVING count( f.room_code ) = DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT( #{outDateEnd}, '%Y%m%d'),DATE_FORMAT( #{inDateStart}, '%Y%m%d') ) +1
